title: ride from mt. pleasant to detroit area for thanksgiving needed (mt.pleasant/cmu)
shortDescription:
hello, 
i am joe. i am a senior at cmu. i am looking for a ride on wednesday november 21st from mt. pleasant to the detroit area. i am from dearborn. will give money for gas. if you can help me out please give me a call or text at 313-685-9373. thank [...]

title: need a ride winn to mt pleasant asap (about 6 miles east of winn)
shortDescription: i need to get into town today before 2 pm. i have some gas money, but the bus cannot be here until around 3pm which is too late.

title: chihuahua puppies (new pics)
shortDescription: i have 2 chihuahua puppies, male and female. the male weighs approximately 2 1/2 lbs, tri colored and as sweet as can be, and loves to cuddle. the female is about 3 lbs now, very unique markings with 2 watch eyes, she is the complete opposite of her  [...]

title: mount pleasant to big rapids (cmu)
shortDescription:
i'm looking for a ride to big rapids this friday (october 12) from mount pleasant. hoping to make it for a friend's birthday. let me know, i'm happy to pitch in for gas! 
-rachel.
